text: Daniel Petru Huza (born 24 June 1970) is a Romanian former footballer who played as a midfielder mainly for Jiul Petroșani, but also for teams such as Minerul Lupeni, Bihor Oradea or Pandurii Târgu Jiu, among others. According to other sources, Huza played in 95 Liga I matches and scored 15 goals, but also in 200 Liga II matches and scored 56 goals.Jiul Petroșani - 100 de ani în alb- negru. Om la om (IX). / Daniel Huza - un simbol al Jiului sau o iubire în alb- negru. zvj.ro After retirement, Huza continued to work for his favourite club, Jiul Petroșani, at the beginning as a coach in the youth center, subsequently being promoted as an assistant coach in the Liga II. In 2011 Huza was promoted as the manager of Jiul, in a tough moment for the club, after it was relegated in the Liga IV due to financial problems.La 41 de ani, Huza face senzație la Jiul. liga2.prosport.ro Huza promoted Jiul and next season continued as the manager of the second squad, remaining in the 4th tier.Fotbal Liga III, Seria V – Evoluţia echipei Jiul Petroşani de la prima rundă până la ultima. gddhd.ro After a short spell at Universitatea Cluj, Huza moved in 2014 in the United Arab Emirates where he continued as a youth coach and technical director for Al Dhafra, Sharjah FC and Al Ain. ==Honours== ===Player=== ;Jiul Petroșani *Divizia B: Winner (1) 1995–96 *Divizia C: Winner (1) 2002–03 ;Minerul Lupeni *Divizia C: Winner (1) 1995–96 ===Manager=== ;Jiul Petroșani *Liga IV – Hunedoara County: Winner (1) 2010–11 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:People from Târnăveni Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani players Category:CS Minerul Lupeni players Category:CSM Reșița players Category:FC Bihor Oradea players Category:FC Farul Constanța players Category:CS Pandurii Târgu Jiu players Category:Romanian football managers Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani managers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Expatriate football managers in the United Arab Emirates
